title: Remove SMS number from account that is not mine
body:
I've recently recovered my account from 2011, only to find out someone else has have taken over the account and added their SMS number. I was able to reset the password and log in, but I cannot remove the SMS number. I can verify that I am the original account creator. 

If this is not the correct place to post this, please point me in the right direction.

replies.body: Hey Oraces, welcome back first of all; second, reach out to my colleagues stating this exact thing so they can look into it and remove the SMS number. You can submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
You got. Thank you, Son Golin.
